title: The Art of Political Lying - change in tone

content.question: The change in tone from the first to the third paragraph serves which of the following functions?

choices.label: It heightens the seriousness of the author's themes and views.
It allows for an ironic reassessment of the man portrayed in the first paragraph.
It offers a sense of reasonable compromise.

content.answer: It heightens the seriousness of the author's themes and views.

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
